channel.title: Quick question
channel.description:
So I saw a picture today from a guy at another forum I go to, stuff hed won in the duela arena, it was pretty good, 400k, a whip, two obby sheilds, 2 d skims, a dbaxe, and a D mace. He only said one thing, it was a stake lure..... Now this is my question, whats a stake lure, and how do you do it? the only information I could find on google was that a level three could beat a level 126 this way, I'm still clueless though.
Any ideas?

item.title: Quick question
item.dc:creator: @Brad_c Brad_c
item.description:
@Brad_c wrote:

Dont lie - So my mate faked the fight, an illusion was it

Dont believe shit like that - I sold him the santa…

Read full topic

item.title: Quick question
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Brad_c:

I know Jagex have done some dumb stuff, but I happen to know this guy got his santa from that, and the level three thing was two monthes ago. If this was a glitch, It would have been reported multiple times and then fixed surely?

Lol. Don’t lie or believe shit like that.

Read full topic

item.title: Quick question
item.dc:creator: @freezepop freezepop5
item.description:
@freezepop wrote:

i got an idea happened to my m8 lost a whip to lvl 14
the other dude might have been using a bow in a ranged only fight
now we all know bows are two handed weapons
well if they turn off sheild then you cant use the bow
and the low lvls throw knives or darts at you untill your dead or give up

cause you dont think when a lvl 14 is staking you 2mill

Read full topic

Pwnt lol then i will bug you!

Ima gonna go bug my friend till he tells me XD.

When I find out, i might tell you guys, unless its something really cool XD

item.title: Quick question
item.dc:creator: @Brad_c Brad_c
item.description:
@Brad_c wrote:

One of my best friends knows what it is, and another got hit by it, and lost 200k to a level three (I watched the duel from the wall), so there must be something else.

Anyone know anything?

Read full topic

item.title: Quick question
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“Ooo Java, post:4, topic:90650”][quote author=error.login link=topic=132313.msg1280663#msg1280663 date=1178550117]
mmmm im thinking a very good pure making himself look like a noob then once in the duel bit he switches to his good stuff
[/quote]
A level 3 couldn’t Defeat a level 126… The only way i could think off is myb a glitch? Like No Movement? And No Melee and use range? But good stakers always have a backup…Like when i was staking i had 500 bloods in invent. And like a mage short

For the other theory, This works for higher levels. For Example (i used my account)
Wear this to get a duel (in the lobby):

Then in stake:

Hope this helped.

~Ollie[/quote]

Told ya he could answer your Q’s

Read full topic
